name: Workable Trigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow when Workable events occur
natural_language_description: 这是 Workable Trigger 节点。主要用于: Starts the workflow when Workable events occur

triggerOn.name: triggerOn
triggerOn.natural_language_description: 参数名: Trigger On | (必填项)

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: job (值: None) - Get notifications only for one job. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
stage (值: None) - Get notifications for specific stages. e.g. 'hired'. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
